5D72A440.Line1.EDC76: You know the Scar, where that demon was killed? Name escapes me. My brother killed a brute there and has been wearing its horn around his neck. “Seven feet tall! It breathed fire! Ma would be so proud!”

915B9744.Line5.EDC76: Say! We’re friends, right? How 'bout you get me a horn, and I’ll give you the coin for the wager. Remember, a really big one!

CC7C0A6D.VoiceDir1.EDC76: Ewan is a happy, excitable drunk, but still coherent. The section in quotes is him mockingly quoting his brothers bragging.

F7671DC2.Line3.EDC76: I got sick of the gloating. Insulted his horn’s size. Now we have this wager. I must get a bigger one. Heh, you can see how it’s going.
